original_text:
Black Mamba
Dedicata a tutti gli amanti del rock’n’roll, Black Mamba è la nuova slot di Play’N’Go che attiva bonus e simboli speciali a colpi di riff distorti e assoli epici!
Tema e funzionalità
La Play’N’Go ha da poco rilasciato Black Mamba, la slot che ha per protagonista l’omonimo gruppo rock/ heavy-metal italiano che ha raccolto consensi in giro per il mondo grazie al disco Heritage. La band è composta da quattro ragazze un ragazzo: Cecilia al basso, Alexandra alla chitarra, Fred alla batteria e infine Martina, la cantante della band.
La grafica ricca di dettagli si ispira a un vero e proprio concerto rock, con la griglia di gioco in primo piano e sullo sfondo le pareti di un locale di musica dal vivo. Sulla destra c’è una postazione su cui si alternano i componenti della band, mentre sul lato sinistro si trovano delle grosse casse da cui partono riff distorti molto potenti. In basso troviamo tutte le informazioni riguardo la nostra giocata e i tasti per settare al meglio la scommessa.
Il sottofondo musicale è rock allo stato puro, ricco di assoli di chitarra e di batteria e con un inciso che rimane in testa anche dopo aver finito di giocare.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
Black Mamba ha una griglia quadrata con 5 rulli a cascata e un sistema di vincita a cluster, ossia le vittorie si ottengono per gruppi di simboli. La puntata minima è di 0,20 €, ma può essere aumentata sino a 100 €, con una vincita potenziale di ben 5.000 volte la scommessa! Tra le varie possibilità c’è anche quella di attivare i giri gratuiti. Black Mamba ha un RTP pari al 94,5% e ha una volatilità media.
Simboli e funzionalità di Black Mamba
I simboli di Black Mamba come è logico sono tutti legati al mondo della musica. I plettri, le bacchette, la cuffie e il microfono sono quelli che pagano meno, seguiti dai membri della band, eccetto Martina, che paga già di tutto con in più un moltiplicatore X2. Il serpente è il nostro Wild pagante, sostituisce tutti i simboli e offe buone vincite soprattutto se appare 5 volte. Inoltre, non scompare come accade con gli altri simboli, ma scende di posizione sino a quando non termineranno le combinazioni vincenti. Durante il gioco regolare casualmente sulla destra appare uno dei membri della band a cui sono legati diversi bonus:
• Fred trasforma dei simboli in altri simboli
• Alexandra distrugge due serie di simboli
• Cecilia fa apparire sino a 2 simboli Wild
• Martina distrugge l’ultima linea e crea un simbolo Martina, che è poi quello che paga di più
Tra i 4 e i 6 simboli della band attivano la funzione “Concerto” in cui ogni musicista si esibisce a turno con il proprio bonus. Per ottenere i Free Spins è invece necessario liberare tutta la griglia. Durante i giri gratuiti per ogni combinazione vincente vedremo il moltiplicatore sulla cassa aumentare di 1x, inoltre ogni volta che il contatore sarà pieno ci verranno assegnati 2 giri extra.

raw_translation.response:
Black Mamba

Dedicated to all lovers of rock'n'roll, Black Mamba is the latest slot released by Play'N'Go that activates bonuses and special symbols with distorted riffs and epic solos!

Theme and Features

Play'N'Go has recently released Black Mamba, the slot featuring the eponymous Italian rock/heavy-metal group that has won acclaim around the world thanks to their Heritage album. The band is made up of four girls and one guy: Cecilia on bass, Alexandra on guitar, Fred on drums and finally Martina, the lead singer of the band.

The graphics, rich in detail, are inspired by a real rock concert, with the game board in the foreground and the walls of a live music venue in the background. To the right is a station where the members of the band alternate, while on the left are large speakers from which very powerful distorted riffs emanate. At the bottom are all the information regarding our gameplay and the buttons to optimally set our bets.

The background music is pure rock, rich in guitar and drum solos, and with a catchy refrain that sticks in your head even after you finish playing.

Main Characteristics of the Slot Machine

Black Mamba has a square grid with 5 cascading reels and a cluster payout system, which means that wins are obtained in groups of symbols. The minimum bet is €0.20, but can be increased up to €100, with a potential win of up to 5,000 times the bet! Among the various possibilities, there is also the option to activate free spins. Black Mamba has an RTP of 94.5% and is of medium volatility.

Symbols and Features of Black Mamba

As is logical, the symbols of Black Mamba are all related to the world of music. Picks, drumsticks, headphones, and microphones are the ones that pay out the least, followed by the band members, except for Martina, who pays out the highest and has a X2 multiplier. The snake is our paying Wild symbol, replacing all symbols and offering good payouts, especially if it appears 5 times. In addition, it does not disappear as it does with other symbols, but moves down a position until there are no more winning combinations. During the regular game, one of the band members randomly appears on the right-hand side, providing different bonuses:

• Fred transforms symbols into other symbols
• Alexandra destroys two sets of symbols
• Cecilia makes up to 2 Wild symbols appear
• Martina destroys the last line and creates a Martina symbol, which is the one that pays out the most.

Between 4 and 6 band symbols activate the "Concerto" function in which each musician takes turns performing with their own bonus. To obtain Free Spins, it is necessary to clear the entire grid. During free spins, the multiplier on the speaker increases by 1x for each winning combination, and every time the counter is full, we are awarded 2 extra spins. 

Translation with style transfer suitable for experienced gamblers:

Black Mamba

The latest release by Play'N'Go, Black Mamba, pays tribute to rock'n'roll enthusiasts by providing bonuses and special symbols that thrash with distorted riffs and epic solos!

Features and Theme

Raging into the industry, Black Mamba invites gamblers to join the Italian rock/heavy-metal crew, who claimed worldwide recognition through their Heritage album. Their five-member squad includes Cecilia on bass, Alexandra on guitar, Fred on drums, and Martina, the striking lead vocalist taking their music by storm.

With a real-concert vibe, the slot showcases a vivid gaming grid in the forefront and a live-music setting in the background. The band member's rotation at the right side and colossal speakers emitting blasting riffs at the left enhance the authentic concert experience. Plus, multiple stake options are available by adjusting the betting settings, and relevant information can be easily accessed at the bottom of the screen.

The heavy metal music that accompanies the frenzy of Black Mamba is packed with electrifying guitar and drum solos that leave a lasting impression even after the game ends.

Main Characteristics of the Slot Machine

The slot machine's square grid has 5 cascading reels with a payout system based on cluster wins, leading to symbol-based groupings for instant wins. With the primary bet starting as low as €0.20, it can soar up to €100, offering a potential gamble of up to 5,000 times the bet! Additionally, the option of activating free spins is one of many possibilities. Black Mamba has an RTP of 94.5% and is of medium volatility, catering to demands for vast payouts and an adrenaline-packed casino experience.

Symbols and Features of Black Mamba

The Black Mamba related symbols are heavily embedded in the music realm. A close look will reveal picks, drumsticks, headphones, microphones, and band members, including Martina as the lead singer, who elevates the chances of winning multipliers with an X2. The snake, known as the paying Wild symbol, helps generate high payouts, particularly when it appears 5 times in a row. Unlike most slot games, this symbol does not disappear. Instead, it shimmies down to one position, resulting in winning combinations.

Furthermore, Black Mamba's game highlights band members who appear on the right side to offer bonuses, including: 

• Fred, who transforms symbols into others
• Alexandra, who destroys two sets of symbols
• Cecilia, who makes up to 2 Wild symbols appear
• Martina, who destroys the last line of her kind and creates a Martina symbol, ultimately leading to higher payouts.

Concerto is unlocked after 4 to 6 band symbols have been initiated, allowing each musician to perform and display their unique bonus. With the feat of clearing the entire grid, Free Spins is triggered, where each winning combination gives players an increment of 1x on the speaker's multiplier. Moreover, a full counter results in an instant award of 2 free spins.

Join Black Mamba's performance, and stake your luck in a riveting slot game!

Dedicated to all lovers of rock'n'roll, Black Mamba is the latest slot released by Play'N'Go that activates bonuses and special symbols with distorted riffs and epic solos!

Theme and Features

Play'N'Go has recently released Black Mamba, the slot featuring the eponymous Italian rock/heavy-metal group that has won acclaim around the world thanks to their Heritage album. The band is made up of four girls and one guy: Cecilia on bass, Alexandra on guitar, Fred on drums and finally Martina, the lead singer of the band.

The graphics, rich in detail, are inspired by a real rock concert, with the game board in the foreground and the walls of a live music venue in the background. To the right is a station where the members of the band alternate, while on the left are large speakers from which very powerful distorted riffs emanate. At the bottom are all the information regarding our gameplay and the buttons to optimally set our bets.

The background music is pure rock, rich in guitar and drum solos, and with a catchy refrain that sticks in your head even after you finish playing.

Main Characteristics of the Slot Machine

Black Mamba has a square grid with 5 cascading reels and a cluster payout system, which means that wins are obtained in groups of symbols. The minimum bet is €0.20, but can be increased up to €100, with a potential win of up to 5,000 times the bet! Among the various possibilities, there is also the option to activate free spins. Black Mamba has an RTP of 94.5% and is of medium volatility.

Symbols and Features of Black Mamba

As is logical, the symbols of Black Mamba are all related to the world of music. Picks, drumsticks, headphones, and microphones are the ones that pay out the least, followed by the band members, except for Martina, who pays out the highest and has a X2 multiplier. The snake is our paying Wild symbol, replacing all symbols and offering good payouts, especially if it appears 5 times. In addition, it does not disappear as it does with other symbols, but moves down a position until there are no more winning combinations. During the regular game, one of the band members randomly appears on the right-hand side, providing different bonuses:

• Fred transforms symbols into other symbols
• Alexandra destroys two sets of symbols
• Cecilia makes up to 2 Wild symbols appear
• Martina destroys the last line and creates a Martina symbol, which is the one that pays out the most.

Between 4 and 6 band symbols activate the "Concerto" function in which each musician takes turns performing with their own bonus. To obtain Free Spins, it is necessary to clear the entire grid. During free spins, the multiplier on the speaker increases by 1x for each winning combination, and every time the counter is full, we are awarded 2 extra spins.
